name: Use of VSIISExeLauncher.exe
description: The "VSIISExeLauncher.exe" binary part of the Visual Studio/VS Code can be used to execute arbitrary binaries
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((process.executable:*\\VSIISExeLauncher.exe OR process.pe.original_file_name:VSIISExeLauncher.exe) AND process.command_line:(*\ \-p\ * OR *\ \-a\ *))`
